string.text: Hey, you said, someone left a little of loot for me, right?
Oh... Yea, here it is.
Perfect. I'm taking it now.

Hey, wait a second... No-no, I'm not trying to rub it from you, off course, it is totally yours present, but... I kept it safe, right? And you can get it now as simple as if the person who left it would give it to you himself. By the way, I do not know, maybe there is something harmful inside, and I'not a very healthy man now, not like in old good times... So. One hundred for keeping it for you - I think it's a fair deal. OK?
Damn, your greed will make you cursed! Here, take. "For safe keeping", huh...
That's fine. Take you loot.
Are you lost your mind? You'll give it here now, or I'll speak up about your undercover deals!
Damn, I'm empty now. Shall take it after some time.
Here, take your diamond gift.
Ha-ha, you scared me! Who will listen to your words?
Newbies in rookies kamp. You can be sure, they will buy nothing from you after that.
Militaries. Guess, what they will do with an unlegal trader caught in Zone?
Then word is not enough, my fist will speak up. Do you want it?
I got some friends here. Very powerful people, you know...

They will by nothing - others will by more. This is Zone.\n They can not leave the Zone - soldiers blocked all exits, and for going deeper they will need ammo, weapons... Where can you get those except me? \n So I don't give a shit on what you say to them, got it?

Ha! Ha-ha! You are really funny guy! I cant laugh so much...\n Where do you think I get all those equipments, all of those arms and ammo? And who do you think is transfering artefacts from the Zone? Militaries needs my business more than anyone. \n But you can go there, that's gonna be interesting. I wonder, will they shoot you before you say something, or after...
Man, if you are more greedy than me - just say it. I do not like nervous guys who's fists are ahead of words...
Remember - friendship ends there big money comes. And I don't care about your friends. Now they are powerful, tomorrow they will lost - it's Zone, understand?
Okay. One hundred - and take your gift.
Thank you.
Got it.
You have something for me, one guy left it, right?
Yes, a small pack. It is here... I almost forgot. Do you need it now?
Yes, I'm taking it.
No problem, here it is.
Thank you very much.
